body_html: @apaszke and, when set the torch.backends.cudnn.enabled = False, the max_norm is not None else has no influence on the random state, so I think the problem is the cudnn problem, but I can not understand why the parameter of max_norm has relation with the cudnn?
body_text: @apaszke and,  when set the torch.backends.cudnn.enabled = False, the max_norm is not None else has no influence on the random state, so I think the problem is the cudnn problem, but I can not understand why the parameter of max_norm has relation with the cudnn?
body: @apaszke and,  when set the `torch.backends.cudnn.enabled = False`, the max_norm is not None else has no influence on the random state, so I think the problem is the cudnn problem, but I can not understand why the parameter of max_norm has relation with the cudnn?
